model.name: ask-more-assume-less---occam's-razor-on-cmm4
model.title: Ask More Assume Less - Occam's Razor on CMM4
model.description: When implementing features or making changes, ask clarifying questions instead of making assumptions. This reduces wrong implementations and fixing cycles. Apply Occam's Razor: the simplest approach is often asking for clarification rather than building based on assumptions. This is especially critical at CMM4 level where precision matters.
